name: Greenhills Condominium
description: Greenhills Condominium is a high-rise residential tower located in San Juan City. The project offers spacious units with breathtaking views of the city skyline. The building has amenities such as a swimming pool, gym, and function rooms for the residents to enjoy.

name: Magallanes Townhomes
description: Magallanes Townhomes is a development of modern townhouses located in Makati City. The project offers spacious and well-designed units with top-quality finishes. It is conveniently located near schools, malls, hospitals, and other essential establishments.

name: Southcrest Condominium
description: Southcrest Condominium is a mid-rise residential development located in Alabang. It offers well-designed units with modern amenities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, and function rooms. The project is conveniently located near shopping centers, hospitals, and schools.

name: Avida Towers
description: Avida Towers is a high-rise residential development located in Cebu City. The project offers affordable and comfortable units with modern amenities, including a swimming pool, gym, and function rooms. It is conveniently located near malls, schools, and hospitals.

name: Acacia Estates
description: Acacia Estates is a master-planned residential community located in Taguig City. It offers spacious and well-designed units with top-quality finishes and modern amenities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, and function rooms. The project is conveniently located near business districts, schools, and hospitals.

name: Portofino Heights
description: Portofino Heights is an Italian-inspired residential community located in Las Piñas City. It offers luxury homes with spacious layouts, high ceilings, and top-quality finishes. The community features a clubhouse, swimming pool, and playground for the residents to enjoy.

name: Forbes Park House and Lot
description: Forbes Park is an exclusive residential enclave located in Makati City. It is known for its luxurious homes, lush greenery, and tight security. The properties in Forbes Park are some of the most expensive in the country, with some reaching billions of pesos in value.

name: One Pacific Residence
description: One Pacific Residence is a luxury beachfront condominium development located in Mactan, Cebu. It offers spacious units with breathtaking views of the ocean, as well as top-quality amenities such as a swimming pool, fitness center, and private beach access.

name: Rockwell Center
description: Rockwell Center is a mixed-use development located in the heart of Makati City. It offers a range of residential options, from luxury high-rise condominiums to spacious townhouses. The development also features a mall, office buildings, and a park for the residents to enjoy.
